tidbits.title: Pacific Island Nation
tidbits.description: Niue is a small Pacific island nation known for its coral reefs, limestone cliffs, and crystal-clear waters attracting divers and nature lovers.

tidbits.title: Cultural Heritage
tidbits.description: The culture of Niue is rich, with a strong Polynesian influence seen in traditional dances, music, intricate crafts, and oral storytelling.

tidbits.title: Conservation Efforts
tidbits.description: Niue is focused on conservation, implementing initiatives to protect its unique biodiversity, including its marine and terrestrial ecosystems.
